claim: Mauritius was a British colony until 1968, when Britain relinquished the territory.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Formerly a Dutch colony  (  1638 -- 1710  )  and a French colony  (  1715 -- 1810  )  , Mauritius became a British colonial possession in 1810 and remained so until 1968 , the year in which it attained independence .
